products.title: Samsung 24'' IPS LED FHD Monitor - 75 Hz - FreeSync, 4ms (HDMI) $89.99 (Open box - $73.99)
products.content_line1: Best Buy has 24'' Samsung T350 1080p 75Hz 4ms FreeSync IPS Monitor (LF24T350FHNXZA) on sale for $89.99. Shipping is free or select free store pickup where available.
products.content_line2: Product Highlights:In-Plane Switching (IPS) panel with great viewing angle (178⁰ H / 178⁰ V) 1920 x 1080 resolution (Full HD) 5ms response time 250 cd/㎡ peak brightness levels VESA mountable (100 x 100 mm) AMD Radeon FreeSync adaptable refresh rate (up to 75Hz max) One HDMI port and one VGA port Note: This monitor does not feature built-in speakers Customers Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars on Best Buy

products.title: Bose Noise Cancelling 700 Wireless Headphones (Refurbished)
products.content_line1: Bose via eBay has Bose Noise Cancelling 700 Wireless Headphones (Refurbished, Black or Soapstone) on sale for $212.46 when you apply coupon code PURCHASECR15 at checkout. Shipping is free.
products.content_line2: Thanks to community member sfdsk for finding this deal.

products.title: Best Ride On Cars Maserati Ghibli 12V Kids' Electric Car + $30 Kohl's Cash
products.content_line1: Kohl's has Best Ride On Cars Maserati Ghibli 12V Kids' Electric Car (Red) + $30 Kohl's Cash (reflected in cart) on sale for $149.99. Shipping is free.
products.content_line2: Thanks to community member anni77777 for finding this deal.
products.content_line3: Note: Kohl's Cash may be redeemed December 25 - January 3 (details). Must select red color to get free shipping.

products.title: Acer 11.6'' Touchscreen Convertible Spin 311 Chromebook, 4 GB 64GB Storage Target $199.99
products.content_line1: 11.6'' HD Touchscreen with IPS technology and Antimicrobial Corning Gorilla Glass. Companion On-the-Go; Intel Celeron processor provides crisp video playback and enables multitasking effortessly.
